summary: The customer was having an issue with their Contoso Wireless TV, which had been freezing up and preventing them from watching anything. The customer service had been poor, so the agent apologized for the inconvenience and promised to look into it. The agent then informed the customer that the warranty on the Contoso Wireless TV is one year from the date of purchase and that any other issues within this time frame would be taken care of by Contoso.
